alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 11:14AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Elko County through 1145 AM PDT... At 1114 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tuscarora, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of western Elko County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
